governance_issues: Reliance on capital markets for funding and growth initiatives

sources.title: CapitaLand Integrated Commercial Trust
sources.snippet: CapitaLand Integrated Commercial Trust (CICT) is the first and largest real estate investment trust (REIT) listed on Singapore Exchange Securities Trading Limited (SGX-ST) with a market capitalisation of S$11.8 billion as at 28 October 2020. It debuted on SGX-ST as CapitaLand Mall Trust in July 2002 and was renamed CICT in November 2020 following the merger with CapitaLand Commercial Trust.
